calculator.contact: If you have any question, check our <faqsLink>FAQ</faqsLink> or <customLink>contact</customLink> our support team
calculator.description: Vocdoni uses its own public voting blockchain (Vochain) to ensure maximum security, verifiability and censorship resistance. Users need tokens to create elections, and final cost depends on census size and duration.

modal.enough_tokens:
You have enough tokens for the election.

Do you still want to buy anyway?
modal.minimum_tokens_purchase:
The minimum purchase of tokens is {{ minimumTokens }} at â‚¬{{ pricePerToken }} per token, totaling â‚¬{{ totalPrice }}.

Do you want to proceed with the purchase?
modal.minimum_tokens_purchase_and_enough_token:
You have enough tokens for the election and the minimum purchase of tokens is {{ minimumTokens }} at â‚¬{{ pricePerToken }} per token, totaling â‚¬{{ totalPrice }}.

calculator.more_tokens: Do you need more tokens than the listed? <customLink>Contact</customLink> our support team
calculator.recurring_description:
Do you need a recurring amount of tokens or do you plan to create multiple elections?

Do you need secure digital voting for your software?

We offer atractive integrations and services agreement options for this kind of needs.

Don't hesitate and contact us and our expert team will assist you and tailor a specific plan for you!
calculator.title: How Vocdoni works?

calendar.max_duration_exceeded: The selected duration exceeds the maximum allowed duration of {{maxDuration}} days for your plan. Reduce the voting length or <4>upgrade your plan</4>.
calendar.title: Calendar

actions.cancel: Cancel the process immediately, not allowing new votes and not counting any results (caution: it cannot be reverted)
actions.cancel_description:
Canceling "{{ election.title.default }}"...
Attention: this action is irreversible and will cancel all the previous votes on it
actions.continue: Resume the process immediately, in case it has been paused
actions.end: End the process immediately, preventing new votes to be submitted, and shows the voting results (caution: it cannot be reverted)
actions.end_description:
Ending "{{ election.title.default }}" voting process...
Attention: this action is irreversible and voters will no longer be able to vote.
actions.error_title: There was some error while executing the transaction
actions.pause: Pause the voting process temporarily, until resumed manually. While the process is paused, voters cannot submit votes.

cc.empty: Apparently this process has no questions

errors.wrong_data_description: The specified data is not correct

pagination.total_results: Showing a total of {{ count }} results

question_types.approval_tooltip: Approval voting lets you vote for as many options as you like. The one with the most votes wins. It's a simple way to show your support for all the choices you approve of.
question_types.multichoice_tooltip: Multichoice voting lets you vote for up to {{maxcount}} options (defined by the voting organizer). The one with the most votes wins.

results.secret_until_the_end: The results will be made public when the process finishes on {{ endDate }}.
results.title: Results for "{{ title }}"

group.actions_description: When a new vote is created, the system takes a snapshot of the group's members at that moment. Any changes to the member list afterward will not affect the created census.

groups_board.create_group: Create a new group to get started.

history.description: View the history of this group and its associated censuses
history.title: {{ title }} History

info.description: Groups are collections of members within your memberbase that can be used to create censuses for voting processes.
info.extra: When you initiate a vote, a census is created as a time-specific snapshot of the group. Any subsequent changes to the group will not affect existing censuses, but will be reflected in future voting processes.
info.title: About Groups

card_1.description: Our solution is 10x cheaper, enhancing democracy by making voting accessible to all.
card_1.title: 10x Cheaper

card_2.description: Save time and effort with Vocdoni's streamlined processes and reduced operational costs.
card_2.title: Reduced Costs

card_3.description: Increase engagement and participation with a user-friendly platform accessible to all, regardless of technical proficiency.
card_3.title: More Participation

card_4.description: Vote from anywhere, on any device. It's that simple.
card_4.title: Effortless Participation

card_5.description: Rest assured that advanced cryptographic methods ensure maximum security while maintaining voter anonymity and vote integrity.
card_5.title: Blockchain Based Security

card_6.description: Foster trust and transparency through blockchain technology, offering full visibility into voting integrity.
card_6.title: Auditable & Open-Source

benefits.subtitle_1: Clients who choose Vocdoni get benefits designed for their voting needs. Our technology enables the transition to digital democracy for organizations, communities and governments. Discover how Vocdoni adds value:
benefits.title: Advantages

card_1.description: Explain us your needs and we will craft a personalized solution for your challenges.
card_1.title: Tailored solutions

card_2.description: Vocdoni offers both self-service and custom, key-in-hand solutions tailored to your needs.
card_2.title: We will be with you every step of the way

card_3.description: We guide you through the entire process to ensure a flawless voting experience.
card_3.title: Expert Support

contactus.title: Let's work together to find the best solution

create_process.helper_1: Voting processes ready in just 10 minutes for your voters, seamlessly compatible with mobile devices.
create_process.subtitle: Vocdoni APP delivers an affordable, easy-to-use, and GDPR-compliant voting experience that anyone can use from anywhere with their PC, laptop, tablet and mobile. Powered by our own Blockchain.
create_process.title: Secure, Cost-Effective and Verifiable Voting Solution

demo.description: Discover the power of Vocdoni through interactive demos, where you can explore different voting scenarios and firsthand experience the seamless transition to digital democracy. Find your desired voting type, test it, and vote with ease.
demo.title: Test our solution

faq_1.description: Vocdoni stands out for its seamless user experience, advanced security features, and unparalleled transparency. Our platform utilizes cutting-edge technology such as zero-knowledge proofs and a custom blockchain to ensure secure and anonymous voting while providing a transparent and verifiable voting process.
faq_1.title: What makes Vocdoni different from other voting platforms?

faq_10.description: We provide technical support to help voters resolve any issues. Additionally, the system is designed to be intuitive and accessible to everyone.
faq_10.title: What happens if a voter has problems accessing or voting?

faq_11.description: Vocdoni is resistant to attacks thanks to blockchain and other advanced security measures. Traditional systems may be vulnerable to manipulation, but in Vocdoni each vote is cryptographically protected and impossible to alter.
faq_11.title: What security does Vocdoni offer against cyber attacks?

faq_12.description: Vocdoni allows you to conduct any type of voting: internal elections, assemblies, referendums, surveys, and participatory processes. The platform adapts to the needs of governments, companies, cooperatives, associations, and other organizations.
faq_12.title: What types of voting can I do with Vocdoni?

faq_13.description: No. Voters receive a secure link or unique credential that allows them to vote without needing to register, simplifying the experience and ensuring anonymity.
faq_13.title: Do voters need to create an account to vote?

faq_14.description: It depends on the voting configuration. In some cases, voters are allowed to change their vote until the process closes.
faq_14.title: Can votes be modified once cast?

faq_15.description: Yes, the platform allows advanced configurations such as weighted voting (where a vote is worth more based on certain criteria) and delegated voting (where a user can transfer their vote to another person).
faq_15.title: Does Vocdoni allow weighted or delegated voting?

faq_16.description: Yes, digital voting can be combined with in-person voting and then integrate the results into a unified count. We offer various systems to conduct hybrid voting.
faq_16.title: Can hybrid (digital and in-person) voting be conducted?

faq_17.description: This depends on the rules of each process. Tiebreaker criteria can be established before starting the vote, such as second rounds or specific rules to determine the winner.
faq_17.title: What happens if there's a tie in a vote?

faq_18.description: Results are generated automatically once voting closes. No manual counting is needed, and results can be verified immediately thanks to blockchain technology.
faq_18.title: How long does it take for results to be published?

faq_19.description: Yes, Vocdoni allows you to configure private voting where only members of a specific census can access.
faq_19.title: Can completely private voting be conducted?

faq_2.description: Yes, Vocdoni strictly adheres to GDPR guidelines, ensuring that user data is handled with the utmost care and confidentiality. Our platform prioritizes data privacy and security at every stage of the voting process.
faq_2.title: Is Vocdoni compliant with data privacy regulations?

faq_20.description: Anyone can verify the results thanks to blockchain transparency. Additionally, we provide tools to audit the voting process and ensure its reliability.
faq_20.title: How can the correctness of results be verified?

faq_21.description: Yes. The platform is designed following accessibility standards (WCAG), making it suitable for people with visual, auditory, or motor disabilities.
faq_21.title: Is Vocdoni accessible for people with disabilities?

faq_22.description: Vocdoni works on any device with internet connection, including computers, tablets, and mobile phones. The platform is optimized for all modern browsers without requiring downloads or installations.
faq_22.title: Which devices are compatible with Vocdoni?

faq_23.description: Voters can receive an invitation via email, SMS, or through a secure link shared by the organization.
faq_23.title: How are voters invited to participate in a vote?

faq_24.description: Vocdoni can handle everything from small groups to massive votes with hundreds of thousands of participants, thanks to its scalable blockchain-based infrastructure.
faq_24.title: How many voters can Vocdoni handle simultaneously?

faq_25.description: Yes, the platform allows you to define roles and permissions for administrators, limiting access to certain functionalities according to organizational needs.
faq_25.title: Can different access levels be set for administrators?

faq_26.description: Vocdoni supports various authentication methods, such as email, eID, SMS code, electronic signature, or integration with existing identification systems.
faq_26.title: How can I ensure only authorized people can vote?

faq_27.description: We offer technical support and recovery tools to ensure all voters can exercise their right to vote without problems.
faq_27.title: What happens if a voter has technical problems during voting?

faq_28.description: Closed census: Only people previously registered in the census can vote. Open census: Anyone meeting certain criteria (e.g., eID verification) can vote.
faq_28.title: What's the difference between a closed and open census?

faq_29.description: Observers can verify the electoral process in real-time and audit results using Vocdoni's transparency and verification tools.
faq_29.title: How does result verification work for observers?

faq_3.description: Absolutely! Vocdoni offers customization options to align with your organization's branding, ensuring a seamless integration with your existing systems and maintaining a consistent brand experience for voters. Contact us to know more!
faq_3.title: Can Vocdoni be customized to fit our organization's branding?

faq_30.description: Yes, you can set exact dates and times for the start and end of voting, eliminating the need for manual intervention.
faq_30.title: Can I schedule a vote to start and end automatically?

faq_31.description: Yes, the platform supports different voting formats, including multiple-choice questions, weighted voting, and systems like preferential voting or STV.
faq_31.title: Can questions have multiple response options?

faq_32.description: Yes, Vocdoni facilitates participation in deliberative processes, assemblies, and governance mechanisms, adapting to various decision-making systems.
faq_32.title: Is Vocdoni suitable for collaborative decision-making processes?

faq_33.description: Yes, Vocdoni allows implementing more sophisticated voting methods according to the needs of each organization or electoral process.
faq_33.title: Can advanced voting methods like Quadratic Voting or Approval Voting be integrated?

faq_34.description: Depending on the voting configuration, you can opt for real-time results or a final count once voting closes.
faq_34.title: Are results accessible in real-time?

faq_35.description: Thanks to blockchain transparency and verifiability, any participant or observer can audit the results to detect possible anomalies.
faq_35.title: How can voting results be challenged?

faq_36.description: Yes, you can easily upload a predefined census via CSV file or integrate it with existing databases.
faq_36.title: Is it possible to import an existing voter census?

faq_37.description: Yes, we follow best security and transparency practices and can adapt to specific regulations from different countries and institutions.
faq_37.title: Does Vocdoni comply with official electronic voting regulations?

faq_38.description: Yes, it's an ideal tool for public consultations, referendums, and citizen participation processes of any scale.
faq_38.title: Can Vocdoni handle referendums and citizen consultations?

faq_39.description: Vocdoni plans include a base number of voters, but you can add more according to your organization's needs. The platform is scalable to handle everything from small assemblies to large elections.
faq_39.title: Are there limits on the number of voters or voting processes?

faq_4.description: We offer the Vocdoni SDK & Vocdoni UI Components libraries, designed for easy integration with your software or platform. We created them to prioritize ease of use on behalf of developers and to enable results from day one. Our team of experts will guide you through the integration process to ensure a smooth transition and minimal disruption to your operations.
faq_4.title: How easy is it to integrate Vocdoni with our existing systems?

faq_40.description: Yes, Vocdoni allows weighted voting, where each vote can have a different value based on criteria defined by the organization.
faq_40.title: Can different voting weights be established?

faq_41.description: Vocdoni is designed to be accessible from any device and browser. In case of problems, we offer technical support and vote recovery options to ensure no one is left without participating.
faq_41.title: What happens if a voter has technical problems during voting?

faq_42.description: Vocdoni uses advanced encryption, zero-knowledge proofs, and a decentralized blockchain architecture to ensure security and resistance against attacks.
faq_42.title: How is the system protected against cyber attacks?

faq_43.description: Yes, we support different voting systems, including simple majority voting, preferential voting (like STV system), multiple-choice questions, and more.
faq_43.title: Can questions with multiple options or preferential voting be created?

faq_44.description: Yes, we offer the possibility to conduct test voting so organizers and voters can familiarize themselves with the system before an official election.
faq_44.title: Is it possible to test before a real vote?

faq_45.description: You can register and start creating votes in just minutes. If you need support or custom configuration, our team is available to help you.
faq_45.title: How can I start using Vocdoni?

faq_5.description: Vocdoni offers comprehensive support to assist you at every step of your voting journey. From initial setup and customization to ongoing maintenance and troubleshooting, our dedicated support team is here to help you maximize the value of our platform.
faq_5.title: What type of support does Vocdoni provide?

faq_6.description: Yes, Vocdoni is equipped to handle elections of any size, from small community votes to large-scale public elections. Our scalable infrastructure ensures reliable performance even during peak voting periods, allowing you to engage voters effectively and efficiently.
faq_6.title: Can Vocdoni handle large-scale elections?

faq_7.description: Security is our top priority at Vocdoni. Our platform utilizes advanced cryptographic techniques and blockchain technology to ensure the highest level of security, maintaining vote integrity and protecting voter anonymity. With Vocdoni, you can trust that your voting process is secure and tamper-proof.
faq_7.title: How secure is the Vocdoni platform?

faq_8.description: Vocdoni ensures voting process integrity by recording each vote as an immutable blockchain transaction, providing transparency and verifiability.
faq_8.title: How does Vocdoni ensure the integrity of voting processes?

faq_9.description: Vocdoni uses advanced cryptographic techniques, such as zero-knowledge proofs (zk-SNARKs), to ensure that no one can link a vote with a voter's identity.
faq_9.title: How is voter anonymity protected?

faqs.subtitle: Below you'll find answers to our users' most frequent questions. Provide clarity and confidence to your digital voting experience.
faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions

card_1.description: From `yes/no` to more complex voting types like multi-choice, approval or ranked elections, we support a wide range of elections to suit any decision-making process.
card_1.title: Versatile Voting types

card_2.description: Customize every aspect of your voting process, from branding and themes to ballot design, ensuring a seamless integration with your organization's identity.
card_2.title: Customization Capabilities

card_3.description: With intuitive interfaces and a guided onboarding process, Vocdoni ensures that organizers and voters alike can easily navigate the platform from day one.
card_3.title: User-Friendly Onboarding

card_4.description: Utilizing robust authentication methods such as two-factor authentication, Vocdoni safeguards against unauthorized access and ensures the integrity of each vote.
card_4.title: Secure Authentication

card_5.description: Create custom voter lists (custom census, oAuth, CRMs...), allowing for targeted outreach and voting experiences tailored to different segments of your audience.
card_5.title: Custom Censuses

card_6.description: Using our specialized decentralized blockchain for voting safeguards voter anonymity and privacy, ensuring a process free from censorship and interference.
card_6.title: Decentralized Voting Protocol

card_7.description: Reach a diverse audience with multi-language support, allowing participants to select their preferred language for inclusive and accessible voting experiences.
card_7.title: Multi-language Support

card_8.description: Monitor voting progress and results in real-time, with instant updates and notifications keeping organizers and participants informed throughout the voting process.
card_8.title: Real-time Updates

card_9.description: Enable voters to cast their ballots through various channels, including web browsers, phones, tablets, etc., ensuring accessibility and convenience for all participants.
card_9.title: Multi-device Support

features.subtitle_1: Vocdoni's feature-rich platform enables seamless customization of voting processes, ensuring secure & transparent elections while empowering voters with intuitive options. Enhance engagement, efficiency, and trust in every voting endeavor.
features.title: Features

process.description_1: Vocdoni APP allows you to create a voting process in 4 easy steps.
process.description_2: We allow you to configure with one click either if you want anonymous voting, secret results until the end, the voting type, upload the census and much more.

step_1.description: Gain total control with our platform's self-service option, offering unmatched flexibility. Need customization or guidance? We've got you covered!
step_1.title: Start your own voting process

step_2.description: You will be guided through the creation process to select your election type, enter the questions & options, select configuration options, & register voters.
step_2.title: Configure & Publish

step_3.description: Voters authenticate and submit their votes seamlessly through our user-friendly flow, designed for universal accessibility across all devices.
step_3.title: Voting Period

step_4.description: As easy as that. Once finished, the results will be automatically computed, published, and available to anyone.
step_4.title: Get the results

process.title: A simple 4 steps process

card_1.description: Streamline decision-making with secure, transparent voting. Engage members effectively, save on administrative costs, and foster a culture of participation and transparency.
card_1.title: Organizations

card_2.description: Enhance community involvement with an easy-to-use platform that encourages participation and gives every member a voice.
card_2.title: Communities

card_3.description: Increase voter turnout, reduce electoral costs, and enhance citizen trust with a verifiable, secure voting process.
card_3.title: Governments and Public Institutions

solutions.subtitle_1: We offer solutions to a wide range of uses-cases, demonstrating the versatility of the Vocdoni App.
solutions.title: Our solution fits your needs

support.header: Let's Try It! Get Free Support
support.subtitle: We can help you create the perfect voting experience
support.title: Start giving a voice to your community

home_features.anonymous_description: Unlock true democracy with zkSNARKs! Participants can cast their votes with complete anonymity, ensuring every voice is heard without compromise.
home_features.census_startegy_description: Craft the perfect census strategy combining variables to determine voter eligibility. Leverage combinations of multiple tokens from EVM-based networks and other data.
home_features.descentralized_description: Onvote runs on top of a specialized decentralized network built for digital voting. The entire process is universally verifiable and the votes are completely tamper-proof.
home_features.flexible_description: Onvote leverages the Vocdoni Protocol: a highly flexible ballot protocol that allows multiple voting methods (like simple, quadratic or ranked voting) as well as other customizations to fit your unique requirements. You can unleash all its potential with our user-friendly SDK.
home_features.gas_less_description: Paying for voting is wrong. To eliminate barriers and uphold governance, voting on Onvote is gasless. Only the initiators of voting processes bear the cost.
home_features.multichain_description: Combine tokens across any chain to maximize voting power. For example, holders can vote with all their $UNI on Polygon, Optimism, Ethereum and more!
home_features.open_source_description: We believe that something as important as your vote must be open-source and publicly audited to be trusted. We release everything under AGPLv3.
home_features.title: <p1>are you</p1><p2>Ready for a new Era of Web3 governance?</p2>

elections_list_empty.description: As an organizer, you have the capability to design tailored voting processes for your community. These procedures provide extensive flexibility, allowing options such as a census where voters authenticate using custom data (such as username, password, and birthday), a token-based system enabling all tokenholders to participate, or a whitelist that uses wallet addresses for eligibility.

privacyPolicy.description: This document outlines the privacy practices for Vocdoni Association ("Vocdoni") concerning the use of its websites and services.

section1.item1: Vocdoni may collect user personal data such as name, organization name, size, type and email addresses when provided as the organization's contact email, though using personal email addresses for this purpose is not recommended.
section1.item2: User consent may be required for the use of certain personal data, which can be withdrawn at any time using Vocdoni's contact details provided below.
section1.item3: Additional personal information may be collected and processed as necessary to deliver services, fulfill contractual obligations, or comply with legal requirements.

section2.description: Vocdoni processes personal information provided directly by users through various means, including registration on any Vocdoni website, service procurement, or communications.

section3.description: The collected information is used to provide and manage services, conduct marketing and business activities, and support customer service and marketing efforts.

section4.description: Vocdoni may share personal information with other companies within the Vocdoni Association or third-party service providers assisting with our services.

section5.description: Vocdoni commits to securing collected personal information with appropriate measures.

section6.description: Users have rights to access, correct, delete, and restrict the processing of their data, among other rights outlined herein.

section7.description: For further details on our data practices or to exercise your rights, please contact us at privacy@vocdoni.org.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy

process_create.voter_auth_2fa_description: Add an extra layer of security by requiring voters to verify their identity
process_create.voter_auth_2fa_email_description: Voters will receive a verification code via email
process_create.voter_auth_2fa_security_description: Two-factor authentication significantly increases the security of your voting process by ensuring only authorized members can vote.
process_create.voter_auth_2fa_sms_description: Voters will receive a verification code via SMS
process_create.voter_auth_2fa_voter_choice_description: Voters can choose their preferred verification method
process_create.voter_auth_description: Set up how voters will authenticate to participate in this voting process.
process_create.voter_auth_guarantees_mid_description_in: Your configuration provides mid-level authentication guarantees with 3 credentials.
process_create.voter_auth_guarantees_mid_list_1: Enable two-factor authentication for strong guarantees
process_create.voter_auth_guarantees_strong_description: Your configuration provides strong authentication guarantees with two-factor verification.
process_create.voter_auth_guarantees_sub_mid: Mid-level authentication guarantees with 3 credentials but no two-factor verification.
process_create.voter_auth_guarantees_sub_strong: Strong authentication guarantees with two-factor verification enabled.
process_create.voter_auth_guarantees_sub_weak: Basic authentication guarantees with 1 credential and no two-factor verification.
process_create.voter_auth_guarantees_weak_description_i: Your current configuration provides minimal authentication guarantees. We strongly recommend:
process_create.voter_auth_guarantees_weak_list_1: Add more credentials (aim for 2) for better identity verification
process_create.voter_auth_guarantees_weak_list_2: Enable two-factor authentication for an additional verification layer
process_create.voter_auth_no_group_description: Please select a group first to configure authentication.
process_create.voter_auth_security_recommendation_1: For better security, we recommend selecting at least 2 credentials.
process_create.voter_auth_security_recommendation_2_one: You've selected {{ count }} credentials, which provides good security for your voters.
process_create.voter_auth_security_recommendation_2_oth: You've selected {{ count }} credentials, which provides good security for your voters.
process_create.voter_auth_select_credentials: Select required credentials for voter authentication
process_create.voter_auth_select_credentials_descriptio: Choose the fields voters must provide to authenticate. Select up to 3 for the best balance of security and ease of use. If you plan to use only email or phone for 2FA, skip this step and click Next to set it up

section1.description1: The Vocdoni Association, headquartered in Switzerland, operates the app.vocdoni.io and onvote.app platforms.
section1.description2: These platforms prioritize user privacy and data security, ensuring compliance with the European Union's General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

section2.description: We prioritize user data security. Here's the summary:
section2.item1: We collect and process personal data necessary for service provision.
section2.item2: All personal data is stored in encrypted form, ensuring that no personal data is stored in plain text.
section2.item3: Metadata submitted by voting organizers may be publicly accessible on IPFS.
section2.item4: Additional data may be collected to fulfill legal obligations or provide specialized services.

section3.item1: Personal data is processed solely for providing and improving our services.
section3.item2: We seek explicit user consent for data processing activities.
section3.item3: We do not use collected data for marketing purposes without explicit user consent.

section4.item1: Personal data is not shared with third parties except where required by law.
section4.item2: Third-party data processors are bound by confidentiality agreements.
section4.item3: Any cross-border data transfers include adequate protection measures.

section5.description1: The Vocdoni Association employs strong security measures to protect personal data.
section5.description2: In the event of a data breach, we will promptly notify affected individuals.

section6.description: To exercise these rights, contact us using the details below.
section6.item1: Access: Obtain information on the processing of personal data.
section6.item2: Correction: Request the correction of inaccurate personal data.
section6.item3: Deletion: Request the deletion of personal data under certain circumstances.
section6.item4: Restriction: Request that we restrict processing of personal data.
section6.item5: Portability: Receive personal data in a structured format.
section6.item6: Objection: Object to processing based on legitimate interests.
section6.item7: Complaint: Lodge a complaint with the relevant data authority.

section7.description1: The Vocdoni Association is not responsible for information submitted by users.
section7.description2: We do not track user data beyond what is essential.

section8.item1: Indirect Damages: The Vocdoni Association shall not be liable for indirect damages.
section8.item2: Force Majeure: The Vocdoni Association is not responsible for delays caused by events beyond our control.

section9.description1: For any queries regarding these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at info (at) vocdoni.org.
section9.description2: By continuing to use our services, you confirm your acceptance of these terms.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions for Vocdoni Association

auth.text: Vocdoni has transformed how we conduct our voting processes

ceec.text: We chose Vocdoni because it guarantees secure, reliable, and transparent participation for all our members in our Annual General Meeting.
